mapper.select: select baaf.*,bd.name as deptName ,'都市圈' providerName ,bu.name as applicantName from bh_application_apply_for baaf left join bh_dept bd on bd.dept_id = baaf.dept_id and bd.is_deleted = 0 left join bh_user bu on bu.account = baaf.applicant and bu.is_deleted = 0 where baaf.is_deleted = 0 order by baaf.create_time desc

select baaf.*,bd.name as deptName ,'都市圈' providerName,bu.name as applicantName from bh_application_apply_for baaf left join bh_dept bd on bd.dept_id = baaf.dept_id and bd.is_deleted = 0 left join bh_application_category bac on bac.id = baaf.category_id and bac.is_deleted = 0 left join bh_user bu on bu.account = baaf.applicant and bu.is_deleted = 0 where baaf.is_deleted = 0 and baaf.id = #{id}

select baaf.*,bd.name as deptName,bu.name as applicantName, baaf.create_time applicationTime,baaf.update_time approveTime from bh_application_apply_for baaf left join bh_dept bd on bd.dept_id = baaf.dept_id and bd.is_deleted = 0 left join bh_user bu on bu.account = baaf.applicant and bu.is_deleted = 0 where baaf.is_deleted = 0 and baaf.applicant = #{applicant} order by baaf.create_time desc
